product_name: Mountain Hardwear Chiller Wide Brim Hat II - Men's
long_description: Every adventurer needs a trusty hat. The Mountain Hardwear Chiller Wide Brim Hat II shades your face from sunny skies whether you're traveling over temperate trails or through jungle wilderness. Summit(TM) stretch nylon fabric dries quickly and wicks moisture away from skin for warm-weather comfort. Side panels and interior forehead panel feature Cool Q.(TM) ZERO stretch-polyester; fabric is specially formulated to provide an ongoing cooling sensation. Lightweight foam brim allows hat to float if dropped in water; hat packs down small for easy transport. UPF 25 sun protection. Mountain Hardwear Chiller Wide Brim Hat II includes an adjustable chin strap.
